title: Disappearance Mystery
story: In the small town of Oakwood, a young girl named Sarah McKenzie has disappeared under unusual circumstances.
Sarah was last seen walking home from school, but she never made it back.
The townspeople are perplexed by her sudden disappearance and fear the worst.
The local police have been tirelessly investigating the case, but they have very few leads to work with.
As a seasoned investigative journalist, it is up to me to unravel the mystery and uncover the truth behind Sarah's disappearance.

suspect.name: Jake Peterson
suspect.alibi: Jake claims he was at work during the time of Sarah's disappearance.
suspect.confirmation: But his fellow coworker saw him leaving the office in a rush.

witness.name: Linda Thompson
witness.observation: Linda saw a suspicious-looking man lurking near the school on the day Sarah vanished.
witness.description: She describes him as tall with a scar across his left cheek.

npcs.name: Detective Johnson
npcs.dialogue: We are doing everything we can to find Sarah. But we need more information

npcs.name: Emily McKenzie
npcs.dialogue: Sarah's mother is devastated and believes someone in the town knows something.

clues.Neighbors' statement: Sarah was seen talking to a stranger before she disappeared.
clues.Suspicious van: A neighbor claims to have seen a van near Sarah's route that afternoon.
clues.Mismatched footsteps: Footprints leading away from the school do not match Sarah's shoe size.
clues.Broken fence: A section of the school fence is broken, indicating a possible escape route.
